New features and enhancements
-----------------------------


Features and enhancements in this release include the following:


### Ability to connect to JSON data in Workbench 4


Workbench 4 now providesÂ the ability to create JSON DataSet Jobs. WhenÂ you selectÂ JSONÂ as yourÂ Data SourceÂ type, you can specify the data node with data you want to retrieve, the delimiter, and how you want the data to be flattened.

For more information aboutÂ connecting to JSON data,Â see [Connecting to JSON data](..\connecting_to_json_data_in_workbench_5\index.html "Creating a Job for Uploading Data Using Workbench 4").


### Workbench 4 Regular Expression Builder


Workbench 4's Search & Replace transformÂ interface now includes a Regular Expression Builder to help you construct more robust regular expressions for use in searching. The Builder allows you to build regular expressionsÂ from a numberÂ of categories, includingÂ character escapes, character classes, anchors, grouping constructs, quantifiers, backreference constructs, alternation constructs, and substitutions. Descriptions are provided for all constructs.


![](1.png)


Â For more information aboutÂ building regular expressions in Workbench 4,Â see [Replacing column values in Workbench 4](..\replacing_a_column_value_in_workbench_5\index.html "Adding Transforms to a DataSet Job in Workbench 4").


### New information when searching


When you perform a Domo-wide search, your results contain additional information to help you find what you're looking for. This information includes the following:



* "People & Groups" results now show the user's profile picture for people results and the number of group members for group results.
* "DomoBuzz" results show the privacy setting for the conversation.
* "Cards" results show the owner and number of views.


For more information about filtering pages, see [Searching in Domo](..\searching_in_domo\index.html "Searching in Domo").
